projects.Title: Toy Dynamo
projects.Body: With friends created a fault-tolerant sharded key-value store. Using vector clocks, and a gossip protocol we maintain causal consistency between network failures

projects.Title: HTTP server
projects.Body: Wrote a load-balanced multi-threaded HTTP server in C. POSIX threads handle incoming requests asynchronously using system calls for file i/o. A lockless asynchronous algorithm quickly writes requests to a log file

projects.Title: HouseHub
projects.Body: Worked with firebase and Swift to create a reactive user experience that allowed users to see realtime updates

projects.Title: Slug Mail
projects.Body: Solo project written in the NERP stack utilizing Material-UI for design.
